column1: Humans seem to be programmed to think of ambivalent feelings at the same time. That is the driving force behind human beings: to be the warrant of all things and to control other worlds.
We’re on some path that’s set since we’re born, but I still believe we can change some things. So I believe in my faith but I still don’t believe in my fate .
Popularity is a bubble. It’s a mountain: you can go up really hard but walk down really fast.
Living without passion is like being dead.
Don’t be trapped in someone else’s dream.
Emotions are so different in every situation and every moment, so I think to agonize every moment is what life is.
Your presence can give happiness. I hope you remember that.
Those who want to look more youthful should live life with a young heart.
Once your heart is moved, it will develop to something better and positive.
Even when this rain stops, when clouds go away, I stand here, just the same.
The music helped me sympathize with our young generation and also empathize with them. I’d like to create and write more music that represents them.
Life is tough, and things don’t always work out well, but we should be brave and go on with our lives.
I think BTS is able to shine because we have fans.
If you don’t work hard, their won’t be a good result.
If I had a chance to improve every aspect of myself, then I would work hard to make happen rather than just sitting idly by.

It’s my official role to represent BTS to the world, and it’s been a chance for me to mature as a person, but behind the scenes, I’m just one of seven members, and I’m inspired by the others all the time.
Isn’t a man someone who doesn’t care about what others think? A man does whatever he wants.

We do make sure that one person doesn’t stand out. But then, we are really unique. We all have our style, so I think we all stand out. We each have our own roles and positions in the band, and then we work together to make sure we all try hard for the Ay.
Your presence can give happiness. I hope you remember that.
Life is a sculpture that you cast as you make mistakes and learn from them.
When I was younger, I thought that everything would just come to me eventually, but now I see I have to take the initiative and practice to improve myself.
Know that the pain will pass. And when it does you will be stronger.
Find your name, find your voice by speaking yourself.
Thank you for accepting us. The 7 boys from Korea who sing in Korean.
A wa smile is the universal language of kindness.
Even if I’m a little hurt it’s okay.
Team work makes the dream work
Maybe I made a mistake yesterday, but yesterday’s me is still me. I am who I am today, with all my faults. Tomorrow I might be a tiny bit wiser, and that’s me, too.
These faults and mistakes are what I am, making up the brightest stars in the constellation of my life.
I would like to ask all of you. What is your name? What excites you and makes your heart beat?
Tell me your story. I want to hear your voice, and I want to hear your conviction. No matter who you are, where you’re from, your skin colour, gender identity: speak yourself.
When things get hard, stop for awhile and look back and see how far you’ve come. Don’t forget how rewarding it is.

I taught myself English. My English teacher was the sitcom Friends. Back in the days when I was, like, 15, 14, it was like a syndrome for Korean parents to make their kids watch Friends. I thought I was a victim at that time, but now I’m the lucky one.

In general, what fans talk about and think about become a very important source of inspiration to us, because we want to write something that’s real to people, especially those who listen to BTS music.
Let’s not push off the things we need to do today for tomorrow.
Never give up on a dream that you’ve been chasing almost your whole life.
Life isn’t about being perfect; it’s about accomplishing your dreams.
All our dreams come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
You can be unhappy but still feel happy when with others.
Happiness is not something that you have to achieve. You can still feel happy during the process of achieving something.
Everyone suffers in their life. There are many sad days. But rather than sad days, we hope to make better days. That’s what makes us live. That’s what makes us dream.
Live life with no worries.
You should always smile in life.
I think that there’s no need to live your life based on the standard of others. Everyone says dream big. But I don’t think you have to live so fiercely like that all the time.
Have confidence in your face from the moment you wake up
Everything becomes a bad thing when you think negative. When you think positive, it becomes better. That’s what I believe.
Look up. And we are all looking up at the same sky.
You’re too young to let the world break you.
When things get hard, stop for awhile and look back and see how far you’ve come. Don’t forget how rewarding it is. You are the most beautiful flower, more than anyone else in this world.
I hope you know your limits well. But don’t stay within those limits. Overcome the limits each day.
Be what you want to be, not what others want to see.

If we helped your dream and your life a bit by our existence, our music, our perfoance, our pictures or videos, even if it’s not big, if we could reduce your pain from 100 to 99, 98 or 97, that makes our existence worthy.
Forget what hurt you, but never forget what it taught you.
We were born to be real, not perfect.
Please, let’s not doubt ourselves and let’s follow our dreams as much as we can.
You never know the value of what you have until you lose it.
Trust is like a paper. When it crumbles, it will never be perfect again.

It’s great to be ambitious and aim for more and more to be happy in the future, as I’ve lived up until now, but I think it’s one of the nicest ways to live life if you know how to enjoy what is in the present.
Silence is golden. Don’t waste time.
You are the leader of your own life.
We’re not winning on our own. Our fans are taking us to victories.
Remember there is a person here in Korea, in the city of Seoul, who understands you.
Inspirational BTS lyrics from their songs
As much as they are known for their introspective music, BTS songs are also known for their uplifting lyrics and beat. Check out some of the band’s most inspiring lyrics.
Failure is the mother of success mother. I learned from that passion and sincerity.    BTS “MAMA”
If you think you’re going to crash, step on the pedal harder.    “NEVER MIND”
Erase all sad memories. Hold each other’s hands and smile.   BTS “2,3!”
To lose your path is the way to find that path. BTS “LOST”
The dawn right before the sun rises is the darkest.  BTS “TOMORROW”
I’m becoming weird. You can’t go to the peak by being noal, baby.   BTS “BOYZ WITH FUN”
Dream, hope, forward, forward.   BTS “YOUNG FOREVER”
It’s all right to not have a dream, if you have moments where you feel happiness for a while.   BTS “PARADISE”
Even if you’re not perfect, you’re limited edition.
This moment won’t ever come again.    BTS “INTRO: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL MOMENT IN LIFE”
BTS “INTRO: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL MOMENT IN LIFE”
Dream, though your beginnings may be humble, may the end be prosperous.   BTS “SO FAR AWAY”
Even if it’s a road of thorns, we still run.    “NEVER MIND”
We must believe only in ourselves.  BTS “LOVE MAZE”
Too many stars, too many dreams. The reality is that in front of these things, I’m just a speck of dust.
Go on your path, even if you live for a day.     “NO MORE DREAM”
In the middle of the road, in the moment you want to give up, shout out even louder: “So what?     BTS “SO WHAT”
Who says a dream must be something grand? Just become anybody. We deserve a life.   BTS “PARADISE”
Whatever, big or small, you are you after all.    BTS “PARADISE”
You’re the answer to all my wonders.   BTS “OUTRO: HER”
The morning will come again. No darkness, no season is eternal.   BTS “SPRING DAY”
Like an echo in the forest. The day will come back around, as if nothing happened. Yeah, life goes on.    BTS “LIFE GOES ON”
You’ll understand someday. You’re my four seasons.    BTS “134340”
Can’t hold me down ‘cuz you know I’m a fighter.   BTS “ON”
In the dark dawn, spreading trembling wings. Keep on shining make it brighter than a spotlight.   BTS “DREAM GLOW”
90% of your worries are just an imaginary swamp that you created.   BTS “SO WHAT”
Decide for yourself what it means to be happy.   BTS “LIGHTS”
Not so perfect, but so beautiful   “EPIPHANY”

What is a Heart throb?

I’ve had to accept that – that everyone cannot love me. Because when there’s love, there’s hate. When there’s light, there’s dark. But it was really hard to accept as an artist that there’s a lot of people that hate me, but on the other side, there are many more people who love me. I think everyone goes through that.
Purple is the last color of the rainbow. Purple means I will trust and love you for a long time.

If you want to love others, I think you should love yourself first.
I have a big heart full of love, so please take it all.

Because love is complex, and we always have the dark sides and the sad sides.
